title: Connectivist-Based Teacher Professional Development for Fostering Creativity in Thai Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design competencies aligned with Thailand’s Higher Education Teacher Professional Standards (Creativity Domain)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the creative instructional activity design process based on connectivism principles with over 80% accuracy
Learners can develop creativity-enhancing lesson scenarios combining the C5 Model and AAA Model for mobile environments
Learners can perform peer feedback activities using creativity assessment rubrics specified in Thai Teacher Professional Standards
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
